scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run server"
scripts.start: npm run build && cd server && node server.js
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

comments.comment-start:dev: TODO: Add your comment about start:dev script inside these quotes// section from the client directory run build and from the server directory run server
comments.comment-concurrently: TODO: Add your comment about concurrently inside these quotes//section concurrently allows multiple commands on a single npm start... in this case to run the server and client npm commands in the package.json
